evaluation_passed_feedback_msg: You have obtained a sufficient score to pass the resource.

evaluation_todo_status: You have to do the evaluation.
evaluation_unknown_status: We don't know your progression in this evaluation.

evaluation_failed_status: You did not pass the evaluation.
